Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.common

Interface Client

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionListener, io.vertx.core.Closeable, GameEventListener, HasElapsableTurns
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UnityClientBehaviour
    public interface Client
extends ActionListener, GameEventListener, HasElapsableTurns, io.vertx.core.Closeable
    An interface that specifies the boundary between a GameContext and a networking channel like a websocket or a plain TCP socket.

    • Method Detail

      • sendEmote

        @Suspendable
void sendEmote​(int entityId,
               com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.Emote.MessageEnum emote)
        Send an emote to a client. By default, there's no implementation except for Unity clients.
        Specified by:
        sendEmote in interface GameEventListener
        Parameters:
        entityId - The entity from which the emote should originate. Typically a hero entity.
        emote - The emote to send

      • lastEvent

        @Suspendable
void lastEvent()
        Called when the last event in a stack of GameEvent has been evaluated. Typically, a client should be notified of an entire sequence of events, so that it has valid data at the end of each event, rather than as the events are processed.
